Class LoginMgr

java.lang.Object
managers.LoginMgr
public class LoginMgr
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for handling login related methods

    • LoginMgr

      public LoginMgr​(java.lang.String loginDetailsFilePath)
      Alternative constructor to allow for possibility of storing login details in seperate locations
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • verifyLoginDetails

      public int verifyLoginDetails​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String password) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, InvalidInputException, FileReadingException, KeyNotFoundException, OutOfRangeException
      Method to verify the login details provided
      Parameters:
      userId - userID to be verified
      password - password to be verified
      Returns:
      1: validated as student user, 2: validated as staff user, -1: validated details but no information retrieved (only for debugging)
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown if userID cannot be mapped to any login details
      InvalidInputException - thrown if password provided is incorrect
      FileReadingException - thrown if files found cannot be accessed
      KeyNotFoundException - thrown if user id cannot be found in system
      OutOfRangeException - thrown if logging in outside of access period

    • createNewLoginDetails

      public void createNewLoginDetails​(java.lang.Object[] details) throws FileReadingException
      Throws:
      FileReadingException

    • updateAccessPeriod

      public void updateAccessPeriod​(User user, java.time.LocalDateTime[] newAccessPeriod) throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.io.IOException, FileReadingException, KeyNotFoundException
      Method to allow changing of access period
      Parameters:
      user - User to be updated
      newAccessPeriod - New access period
      Throws:
      FileReadingException - Thrown if file cannot be accessed
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown if wrong/invalid class found in file
      java.io.IOException - Thrown if error resulted during file access
      KeyNotFoundException - Thrown if file cannot be found
